name: mathjax-unicode-math
description: MathJax TeX input extension reimplementing (parts of) the unicode-math package

scripts.test: cd bin && perl make_test && cd .. && node test/base.js
scripts.postinstall: cd node_modules/mathjax-full && npm i && npm run compile
scripts.build: cd bin && perl make_maps && cd .. && npx tsc
